import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // import Calendar from 'react-calendar' import CustomerTaskList from './../components/CustomerTaskList.js'; import { MdOutlineKeyboardReturn, MdOutlineClose } from 'react-icons/md'; function LogOutEventHandler(event){ alert(`You have logged out.`) event.preventDefault() } function HomePage({EngagementTypes, customerTasks } ) { const [key, setKey] = useState("start"); const [color, setColor] = useState("div1") const [phrase, setPhrase] = useState("How can we help you today?") const [alertState, setAlert] = useState("alert") function updateAlert(e){ setAlert("alertHide") } function update(e){ let newKey = e.target.value console.log(newKey) if (newKey=="learn"){setKey(1); setColor("div1"); setPhrase("What are you interested in learning?");} if (newKey=="react"){setKey(2); setColor("div2"); setPhrase("What do you need Qualtrics to do?");} if (newKey=="mature"){setKey(3); setColor("div3"); setPhrase("Let's mature your program! What are you most interested in?");} if (newKey=="guide"){setKey(4); setColor("div4"); setPhrase("Where can we provide additional guidance?");} } let choices = '' if (key=="start"){choices =

{phrase}

} else{ choices=

{phrase}

{ EngagementTypes[key].map((engagement,i) =>
) }
} return ( <>

{choices} {/* This is handled using if logic at the top */}

); } export default HomePage;
